name: Pokémon Emerald Lucario
overview: Story: You have been told that when you grow up you will get a very strong Pokémon. You are 10 years old and your family is moving to a new region. Shortly after getting settled in your new home, you go out and see a strange scene: a wild Pokémon is attacking a man! This is the moment your fateful journey begins! Features: • New starters • New tiles • Chinese text
